sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
guarantees another
, zagotovo povzroči, da se zgodi druga.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To guarantee something
pomeni obljubiti, da se bo nekaj vsekakor zgodilo ali da bomo tisto storili ali priskrbeli.

seg.quote: I'm not guaranteeing that this will work.
They guarantee to hold interest rates down until next year.
Advertisers were guaranteed a weekly circulation of 250,000.

sense.def:
To guarantee that something will happen
ali
it is guaranteed to happen
pomeni, da smo prepričani o tem, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: You should have one evening off a week, but you can't guarantee it.
This state of affairs is guaranteed to continue indefinitely.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a guarantee of a particular thing
, je gotovo, da se bo dololčena stvar zgodila ali je resnična.

seg.quote: There is no guarantee that they are telling the truth.
The jury system is one of the guarantees of democracy.

sense.def:
A guarantee
je tudi obljuba, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: We want some guarantee that an enquiry will be held.

sense.def:
Kadar podjetje
guarantees work
, pisno obljubi, da bodo vse napake, ki bi jih uporabnik v določenem času odkril, brezplačno popravili ali pa izdelek zamenjali.

A guarantee
je tudi pisna obljuba nekega podjetja, da bo v primeru, če se bo na njihovem delu v omejenem časovnem roku pokazala napaka, izdelek brezplačno popravilo ali zamenjalo.

seg.quote: How long does the guarantee last?
